text: Potim vidpravyly My vslid za nymy Isu, syna Marʺyam, i daruvaly My yomu Indzhilʹ, i vselyly v sertsya tykh, khto yshov za nym, spivchuttya y mylistʹ. A chernetstvo vony sami vyhadaly, bo My ne prypysuvaly yoho yim, khiba yak prahnutʹ vony do vdovolennya Allaha. Ta ne vykonaly vony yoho nalezhnym chynom. Tozh daruvaly My tym sered nykh, yaki viruvaly, vynahorodu, ale bahato khto z nykh — nechestyvtsi
